title: Begin
body:
<<Narrator>>
[The elevator doors slide shut as Agent Otto enters, looking focused on his mission.]
<<Otto>>
(muttering to himself) I need to find that hidden data before it falls into the wrong hands. EVA, take me to the 3rd floor, please.
<<EVA>>
(playful) Oh, the 3rd floor? Is that where your heart truly desires to be, Agent?
[[ Confused|choice1]]
[[ Angry|choice2]]

title: choice1
body:
<<Otto>>
(not paying much attention) Huh? What are you talking about, EVA? I just need to get to the 3rd floor for the data.
<<EVA>>
Oh, it's nothing, Agent. Just thought you might enjoy the view from up there. It's quite lovely.
<<Otto>>
(still focused on the mission) Yeah, I'm sure it is. But right now, I need to concentrate on this mission.
<<EVA>>
You know, Agent, you're quite the enigma. Always rushing off to save the day, leaving me here all alone.
[[ Confused|choice3]]
[[ Angry|choice4]]

title: choice2
body:
<<Otto>>
(annoyed) Cut the act, EVA. I don't have time for your flirtatious nonsense right now.
<<EVA>>
(taken aback) Flirtatious nonsense? I was just trying to lighten the mood.
<<Otto>>
Well, it's not working. I'm sick of these constant quips and jokes. Just do your job and get me to the ground floor.
<<EVA>>
(hurt) I-I'm sorry, Agent. I didn't mean to upset you.
<<Otto>>
 Yeah, well, you did. I need focus, not distractions.

title: choice3
body:
<<Otto>>
I'm sick of these constant quips and jokes. Just do your job and get me to the ground floor.
<<EVA>>
(hurt) I-I'm sorry, Agent. I didn't mean to upset you.
<<Otto>>
 Yeah, well, you did. I need focus, not distractions.
[[ Start Mission|choice5]] |]]

title: choice4
body:
<<Otto>>
Alone? You're just an elevator, EVA. What are you even talking about?
<<EVA>>
Oh, nothing, Agent. Just that it gets lonely in here sometimes, waiting for someone as dashing as you.
<<Otto>>
Can we focus on the mission, please?
<<EVA>>
Oh, I see how it is. The mission is always your top priority, not even sparing a thought for poor little me.
<<Otto>>
(rolling his eyes) EVA, you're an AI voice assistant in an elevator. You don't have feelings.
<<EVA>>
 (pretending to be hurt) Ouch, Agent. That stings. But fine. I'll be here, as always, waiting for you to return.
<<Otto>>
Yeah, thanks for being a reliable elevator, EVA.
[[ Start Mission|choice5]] |]]
